Summary: It was wierd it came about 2 feet above my truck it like threw some thing fiery on it and melted a hole on top.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were hunting and liked came out of nowere itwas comingabout 3feet above us and me and my dad jumped down it stayed directly above us for about 30 sec and it moved to our truck and it dropped a firerey marblr on it was ot big at all it was as big as our dog a 4year old lab
